ccTransfer(bytes4,bytes,bytes,bytes4,uin.details: Validates the transfer request, then,                                     if speed is 1, the request is instant                                     which pays back the loan,                                     if the speed is 0, it is a normal transfer

params._blockNumber: The block number of the request tx
params._index: Index of tx in the block
params._lockerLockingScript: Locking script of locker that user has sent BTC to it

returns._0: True if the transfer is successful

params._relay: The Relay address to validate data from source chain
params._startingBlockNumber: Requests that are included in a block older than _startingBlockNumber cannot be executed
params._treasury: Address of treasury that collects protocol fees

isRequestUsed(bytes32).details: This is to avoid re-submitting a used request

params._txId: The txId of request on the source chain

returns._0: True if the request has been executed

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._instantRouter: Address of the instant router contract

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

CCTransfer(bytes,uint256,address,address.notice: Emits when a cc transfer request gets done

NewInstantRouter(address,address).notice: Emits when changes made to InstantRouter address

NewLockers(address,address).notice: Emits when changes made to Lockers address

NewProtocolPercentageFee(uint256,uint256.notice: Emits when changes made to protocol percentage fee

NewRelay(address,address).notice: Emits when changes made to relay address

NewTeleBTC(address,address).notice: Emits when changes made to TeleBTC address

NewTreasury(address,address).notice: Emits when changes made to Treasury address

ccTransfer(bytes4,bytes,bytes,bytes4,uin.notice: Executes the cross chain transfer request

constructor.notice: Gives default params to initiate cc transfer router

isRequestUsed(bytes32).notice: Check if the request has been executed before
